languages.text: {n}Гордость побеждает ужас и Кляйн, игнорируя насмешку товарища, тихо бормочет:{/n} "Не надо мне отдыхать. Я... исполню свой долг и вскрою ублюдка".
{n}Klein's pride begins to outweigh his fear. Ignoring Hrotko's taunts, he mutters,{/n} "I don't need rest. I... will do my duty and open up the freak."
languages.original_text: {n}Гордость побеждает ужас и Кляйн, игнорируя насмешку товарища, тихо бормочет:{/n} "Не надо мне отдыхать. Я... исполню свой долг и вскрою ублюдка".

languages.text: {n}La fierté de Klein commence à l'emporter sur ses craintes. Ignorant les provocations de Hrotko, il marmonne :{/n} « Je n'ai pas besoin de repos. Je... je vais faire mon travail et ouvrir ce phénomène de foire. »
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's pride begins to outweigh his fear. Ignoring Hrotko's taunts, he mutters,{/n} "I don't need rest. I... will do my duty and open up the freak."

traits.locale_text: {n}La fierté de Klein commence à l'emporter sur ses craintes. Ignorant les provocations de Hrotko, il marmonne :{/n} « Je n'ai pas besoin de repos. Je... je vais faire mon travail et ouvrir ce phénomène de foire. »

languages.text: {n}El orgullo de Klein empieza a sobreponerse a su miedo. Haciendo caso omiso de las burlas de Hrotko, murmura:{/n} «No necesito descansar. Cumpliré... con mi deber y abriré al monstruo».
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's pride begins to outweigh his fear. Ignoring Hrotko's taunts, he mutters,{/n} "I don't need rest. I... will do my duty and open up the freak."

traits.locale_text: {n}El orgullo de Klein empieza a sobreponerse a su miedo. Haciendo caso omiso de las burlas de Hrotko, murmura:{/n} «No necesito descansar. Cumpliré... con mi deber y abriré al monstruo».

languages.text: {n}克莱因撑着自尊心，努力战胜恐惧。他毫不理睬赫洛卡的嘲笑，喃喃自语道：{/n}“我不需要休息，我……会尽我的职责，把这个怪物的肚子切开。”
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's pride begins to outweigh his fear. Ignoring Hrotko's taunts, he mutters,{/n} "I don't need rest. I... will do my duty and open up the freak."

traits.locale_text: {n}克莱因撑着自尊心，努力战胜恐惧。他毫不理睬赫洛卡的嘲笑，喃喃自语道：{/n}“我不需要休息，我……会尽我的职责，把这个怪物的肚子切开。”

languages.text: {n}クラインのプライドが恐怖を上回り始めた。フロトコの嘲笑を無視し、呟いた。{/n}「休む必要はない。私は…自分の義務を果たし、化物を開けてやる」
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's pride begins to outweigh his fear. Ignoring Hrotko's taunts, he mutters,{/n} "I don't need rest. I... will do my duty and open up the freak."

traits.locale_text: {n}クラインのプライドが恐怖を上回り始めた。フロトコの嘲笑を無視し、呟いた。{/n}「休む必要はない。私は…自分の義務を果たし、化物を開けてやる」

languages.text: {n}Kleins Stolz beginnt, seine Furcht zu überwiegen. Er ignoriert Hrotkos Sticheleien und murmelt:{/n} "Ich muss mich nicht ausruhen. Ich ... werde meine Pflicht tun und den Freak aufschneiden."
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's pride begins to outweigh his fear. Ignoring Hrotko's taunts, he mutters,{/n} "I don't need rest. I... will do my duty and open up the freak."

traits.locale_text: {n}Kleins Stolz beginnt, seine Furcht zu überwiegen. Er ignoriert Hrotkos Sticheleien und murmelt:{/n} "Ich muss mich nicht ausruhen. Ich ... werde meine Pflicht tun und den Freak aufschneiden."

languages.text: {n}Klein'ın gururu, korkusundan ağır basmaya başlıyor. Hrotko'nun iğnelemelerini yok sayarak homurdanıyor.{/n} "Dinlenmeye ihtiyacım yok. Ben... Vazifemi yerine getirip o ucubenin içini dışına çıkaracağım."
languages.original_text: {n}Klein's pride begins to outweigh his fear. Ignoring Hrotko's taunts, he mutters,{/n} "I don't need rest. I... will do my duty and open up the freak."
